Invariant pp and dA cross sections at eta=0, as functions of pt. 
Their ratio would be my R_dA (at least that's what we used in the paper).
I used the nuclear pdfs discussed in  Frankfurt et al,
Eur.Phys.J.A5:293-306,1999 ,  JHEP 0202:027,2002  , hep-ph/0303022
